text: Hagi tagranena antahi'none kasegema tami'neana fatgozama nehaza vahe'mokizmigure huno ozami'ne. Hagi kasegema ovariri'za ha'nentake nehu'za, Anumzamofo avu'ava nosu'za kumi' nehaza vahe'ene mani otage osu'za, otage huno mani'zanku huhavi'za nehu'za, nezmafano nezamrerano zamahe nefri'za, vahe zamahe nefri'za,
